user_query: My friend is interested in investing in cryptocurrencies and he wants to know the current price of Ethereum in US dollars. Can you provide him with the latest ticker data for ETH-USD? Also, he wants to check the balance of his Ethereum wallet address and see if it contains any Ontology coins.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the latest ticker data for Ethereum (ETH) in US dollars (USD).
Check the balance of the specified Ethereum wallet address.
Check the balance of Ontology coins in the specified Ethereum wallet address.
